original: nityānitye nirvikāre prajñe devi namo'stu te || 1 ||
analyzed: nitya anitye nirvikāre prajñe devi namaḥ astu te

original: prapitāmahi sattvānāṃ prajñe devi namo'stu te || 2 ||
analyzed: prapitāmahi sattvānām prajñe devi namaḥ astu te
mātar mātar jaganmātar iti saṃjapatām nṛṇām

original: manorathaprade śuddhe prajñe devi namo'stu te || 3 ||
analyzed: manoratha prade śuddhe prajñe devi namaḥ astu te

original: lakṣmīstvamasi kalyāṇi śrīrdhīḥ śraddhā dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ |
analyzed: lakṣmīḥ tvam asi kalyāṇi śrīḥ dhīḥ śraddhā dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ

original: sarvasvarūpe sarveśi prajñe devi namo'stu te || 4 ||
analyzed: sarva svarūpe sarva īśi prajñe devi namaḥ astu te

original: daśa pāramitākāre prajñe devi namo'stu te || 5 ||
analyzed: daśa pāramitā ākāre prajñe devi namaḥ astu te
